instruction: Summarize the article about the benefits of learning a new language.
input: Article: Learning a new language can be one of the most rewarding experiences of a person’s life. Not only does it open up a world of possibility for global travel, but it also provides an incredible opportunity for personal growth and understanding of other cultures. It can also unlock features of our own language that we didn't know existed.
output: Learning a new language can open up opportunities for global travel, personal growth and unlocked knowledge of both the new language and our own. It is an extremely rewarding experience that can provide a deeper understanding and appreciation of different cultures.
